replies.msg: Science (Group A) program is tailor-made for those students who are interested in the fields of Physical Science.  Science (Group B) program is more suitable for those students who are interested in the fields of Chemistry and Life Science.

Under School-based admission, students admitted into the School of Science through Science (Group A) program (JS5102) upon completion of the first year of study will enroll into one of the following degree programs:

Offered by School of Science and Joint School Programs:

BSc in Mathematics
BSc in Ocean Science and Technology
BSc in Physics
BSc in Data Science and Technology
BSc in Mathematics and Economics
BSc in Risk Management and Business Intelligence
Dual Degree or Interdisciplinary Program:

BEng/BSc & BBA Dual Degree Program in Technology and Management
BSc in Environmental Management and Technology
BSc in Individualized Interdisciplinary Major

replies.msg:
我本身都唔知佢網上咁出名
係有個學生whatsapp我send相關嘅嘢比我睇先知
只可以講我欣賞佢讀書態度嘅 主動積極
都係做過一份mock 問過少少問題咁
有少少人情世故嘅嘢佢未必明
但睇佢答題有時盲信某啲補習技巧（會寫底個技巧起卷上面）但係整體都睇得出有用心溫書同研究考試
我諗retake呢一年令佢成長唔少嘅
蔚仔如果你有睇呢個po 好多人笑你 但更多嘅人會為你開心嘅 大個仔

往者不可諫，來者猶可追
